_comment: Created by ianb on 16/12/2014 11:16:35 using v2.3
title: How have alcohol related deaths changed in different age and sex groups?
analysis_commentary: Age-sex standardised rates across different age-sex groups shows the rate of alcohol related deaths is highest in men. The increase in alcohol related deaths over this time period was driven by the increase seen in men in the 35-74 age groups. The highest alcohol related death rate is in men aged 55-74.
